testcase.classname: To validate the functionality of Metallica application
testcase.name: To validate all the fields in the Shipping Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to shipping page.........................................passed And User validate the mandatory fields......................................passed And User validate the shipping address fields...............................passed And User select address from saved address dropdown.........................passed And User click the Use this address checkbox................................passed And User click the Is this a Gift checkbox..................................passed Then User select the Shipping Method........................................passed And User check shipping method label for Pre Order product..................passed And User click the Continue to billing button...............................passed
